member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Diagnostics.HttpRouteParameterRedactionMode
member.summary: Strategy to decide how HTTP request path parameters are redacted.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Diagnostics.HttpRouteParameterRedactionMode.Loose
member.summary: All parameters are considered as non-sensitive and included as-is by default.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Diagnostics.HttpRouteParameterRedactionMode.None
member.summary: Route parameters are not redacted regardless of the presence of data classification annotations.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Diagnostics.HttpRouteParameterRedactionMode.Strict
member.summary: All parameters are considered as sensitive and are required to be explicitly annotated with a data classification.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ITagCollector
member.summary: Interface given to custom tag providers, enabling them to emit tags.

member.summary: Adds a tag.
member.param: The name of the tag to add.
The value of the tag to add.
The data classifications of the tag value.
member.exception: is empty or contains exclusively whitespace, or when a tag of the same name has already been added.

member.summary: Adds a tag.

The value of the tag to add.
member.exception: is empty or contains exclusively whitespace, or when a tag of the same name has already been added.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogPropertiesAttribute
member.summary: Marks a logging method parameter whose public properties need to be logged as log tags.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogPropertiesAttribute.OmitReferenceName
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prefix the name of the parameter or property to the generated name of each tag being logged.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogPropertiesAttribute.SkipNullProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether properties are logged.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogPropertiesAttribute.Transitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to transitively visit properties which are complex objects.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogPropertyIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Indicates that a tag should not be logged.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TagNameAttribute
member.summary: Defines the tag name to use for a logged parameter or property.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The tag name to use when logging the annotated parameter or property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TagNameAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the tag to be used when logging the parameter or property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TagProviderAttribute
member.summary: Defines a method to invoke to generate logging tags for a referenced object.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with custom tags provider.
member.param: A type containing a method that provides a custom set of tags to log.
The name of a method on the provider type that generates a custom set of tags to log.
member.exception: is either an empty string or contains only whitespace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TagProviderAttribute.OmitReferenceName
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to prefix the name of the parameter or property to the generated name of each tag being logged.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TagProviderAttribute.ProviderMethod
member.summary: Gets the name of the method that provides tags to be logged.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TagProviderAttribute.ProviderType
